resources.string: Available in the PREMIUM version
Only in the LITE version
Welcome to\nPrintoid %s
This short introduction will show you the content of the application
Versions comparator
Video streaming, custom commands, 2D & 3D visualizers, real-time simulator, advanced control, widgets and more…
Basic pack of features for free & for an unlimited duration
Compare the versions
Exclusive widgets
Monitor your 3D printer(s) without having to start the application!
Camera Widget: show a fresh image from your camera with one click!
Server Status Widget: show the current printing job progress without having to start the app!
Video streaming
Always keep an eye on what\'s happening on your 3D printer plate!
In-app video player, launcher widget and floating icon to see your video from anywhere
Setup my camera
Start low/high quality
Support 2 cameras
Your own commands
Customize Printoid with your own commands & features!
Create your own buttons to send GCODE commands to your 3D printer
Communicate with your Raspberry Pi over SSH (control a relay…)
Access to your OctoPrint built-in commands (registered in config.yaml)
GCODE commands
SSH commands
HTTP commands
Easy connection to OctoPrint servers
Control and manage as many OctoPrint servers and 3D printers as you need!
Supports LAN and WAN configurations, basic authentication, SSL/TLS (HTTPS), TLS certificate, SSH…
Supports the OctoEverywhere plugin for a safe connection to your server from everywhere in the world!
Supports Obico - Access Anywhere plugin for a safe connection to your server from everywhere in the world!
How to connect?
Connect from outside (3G/4G/5G…)
Adjust the settings
2D & 3D visualizers
Show layers of your GCODE files in 2D or visualize your STL or GCODE object in 3D!
Printoid also provides a real-time 2D simulator when you are printing an object
How does it work
WearOS module
Control and manage your 3D printer directly from your wrist!
Printer informations, axis control, temperatures/ventilation/extruders management, files and commands lists
This module is only available for WearOS (NOT available for Samsung Wear (Tizen))
All the tools you need for your 3D printer(s)
Supports up to 10 heated heads, heated bed, heated chamber, ventilation…
Control of feedrate, flowrate, extrusion, retraction, axis, homing, baby stepping…
Temperature targets, temperature offsets, button to stop motors, presets…
Timelapses, GCODE scripts, alerts and notifications…
Official website and support
You will be able to find all the responses to your questions on https://printoid.net
Constant updates, tricks & tips, useful informations, development communication…
Feel free to contact the developer by e-mail for any issue or feature request!
News feed
Frequently Asked Questions
Contact the developer
And much more in Printoid PREMIUM!
Supports OctoPrint plugins: Enclosure, Octolapse, PSU Control, TPLink Smartplugs, WemoSwitch…
Control with a physical keyboard or from ADB!
Printoid Hub: the status of all your OctoPrint servers within the same screen!
Filament spool manager: integration with RollingUp!
Protect the app with a PIN code or with your fingerprint!
Start Printoid
Follow the team on:
Backup & restore

Printoid is able to restore the whole configuration from a previous installation if needed (if you had installed Printoid LITE for example).\n\nTo achieve this, please accept the permission in the following dialog.
Can\'t apply the backup from Printoid %s, an error occurred
Can\'t apply the backup from Printoid %s, its \'write external storage\' permission is not granted
Can\'t apply the backup from Printoid %s, an unknown error occurred
Restore local backup
Restore from Printoid %s
I have an account
More backup options
